text: @realDonaldTrump Nothing fake about your lack of leadership.  You failed to prepare this country for the Covid-19 pandemic. You failed to respond to the pandemic and caused the economy to crash and burn. You failed in regards to improving race relations. In fact you keep adding fuel to the fire.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
